Source.Name: tomcat-connectors
Source.Summary: Provides mod_jk for connecting httpd to a Tomcat container
Source.Description: mod_jk is an Apache module used to connect the Tomcat servlet container with web servers such as Apache, iPlanet, Sun ONE (formerly Netscape) and even IIS using the Apache JServ Protocol.

Package.Name: tomcat-connectors
Package.Summary: Provides mod_jk for connecting httpd to a Tomcat container
Package.Description: mod_jk is an Apache module used to connect the Tomcat servlet container with web servers such as Apache, iPlanet, Sun ONE (formerly Netscape) and even IIS using the Apache JServ Protocol.
